name: 張素薰
objective:
本課程利用新聞教材加強英語字彙能力及聽力技巧, 　　內容採用電台、報紙、電視的時事、深度報導和全球議題以增強學生英語知識。同時, 學生亦可獲得各種有用的聽力技巧以加強英語聽力。
This course is designed to increase vocabulary power and develop listening skills in English through up-to-date news. Current events, in-depth reports as well as global issues from radio, newspapers and T.V are provided to enrich the student's English knowledge. Effective listening skills are reinforced to enhance the student's listening comprehension.
schedule:
Journalistic English & Listening Training
I.　　Introduction:
This course is designed to fortify English listening and speaking abilities by exploring different aspects of the contemporary themes in which vocabulary build-up and its application to relevant topics are emphasized. Current events, in-depth reports as well as global issues from radio, newspapers and T.V are provided. 
Basic Doctrines:
Expose students to cosmopolitan themes that are up-to-date, sophisticated and varied in tone, with a view to stimulating students more profoundly and to accelerating their retaining and using in the target language.
The films of contextually rich—cultural background and competent knowledge-related to the corresponding themes are provided to integrate the skills of the target language.
Language capability and performance are equally stressed and developed.
Students’ active participation is essentially required.
Individual reflection is perceived by pair and group works, out-of-class assignments for review and research, oral reports and specific presentations.



II.　　Assessment:
1.　　Weekly tests and Attendance (20 points maximum deduction). 80%
2.　　Oral reports and presentations. 20%
